00023 
00024 void ObjectModelCylinder::computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate,
00025                 bool &modelFound){
00026 
00027 std::vector<int> samples;
00028 std::vector<int> selection;
00029 getSamples(iterations,selection);
00030 
00031 if (selection.size () == 0){
00032         isDegenerate = false;
00033         modelFound = false;
00034         return;
00035 } else {
00036 
00037         isDegenerate = true;
00038 
00039 }
00040 
00041 if (!computeModelCoefficients (selection, model_coefficients)){
00042         modelFound = false;
00043         return;
00044 } else {
00045         modelFound = true;
00046         return;
00047 }
00048 }
00049 
00050 void
00051 ObjectModelCylinder::getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples)
00052 {
00053 
00054         assert(this->inputPointCloud!=NULL);
00055 
00056         samples.resize (2);
00057         double trand = this->inputPointCloud->getSize() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00058 
00059         // Get a random number between 1 and max_indices
00060         int idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00061         // Get the index
00062         samples[0] = idx;
00063 
00064         // Get a second point which is different than the first
00065         do
00066         {
00067                 idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00068                 samples[1] = idx;
00069                 iterations++;
00070         } while (samples[1] == samples[0]);
00071         iterations--;
00072 
00073         //        std::cerr << samples[0] << " " << samples[1] << std::endl;
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool ObjectModelCylinder::computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples,
00077                 Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients){
00078 
00079         assert (samples.size () == 2);
00080 
00081         if (!this->normals && this->normals->getSize()!=this->inputPointCloud->getSize())
00082         {
00083                 cout<<"[ObjectModelCylinder::computeModelCoefficients] No input dataset containing normals was given!";
00084                 return (false);
00085         }
00086 
00087         Eigen::Vector4d p1 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(),
00088                         (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00089 
00090         Eigen::Vector4d p2 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(),
00091                         (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00092 
00093         Eigen::Vector4d n1 = Eigen::Vector4d (this->normals->getNormals()->data()[samples[0]].getX(),
00094                         this->normals->getNormals()->data()[samples[0]].getY(),
00095                         this->normals->getNormals()->data()[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00096 
00097         Eigen::Vector4d n2 = Eigen::Vector4d (this->normals->getNormals()->data()[samples[1]].getX(),
00098                         this->normals->getNormals()->data()[samples[1]].getY(),
00099                         this->normals->getNormals()->data()[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00100 
00101         Eigen::Vector4d w = n1 + p1 - p2;
00102 
00103         double a = n1.dot (n1);
00104         double b = n1.dot (n2);
00105         double c = n2.dot (n2);
00106         double d = n1.dot (w);
00107         double e = n2.dot (w);
00108         double denominator = a*c - b*b;
00109         double sc, tc;
00110         // Compute the line parameters of the two closest points
00111         if (denominator < 1e-8)          // The lines are almost parallel
00112         {
00113                 sc = 0.0;
00114                 tc = (b > c ? d / b : e / c);  // Use the largest denominator
00115         }
00116         else
00117         {
00118                 sc = (b*e - c*d) / denominator;
00119                 tc = (a*e - b*d) / denominator;
00120         }
00121 
00122         // point_on_axis, axis_direction
00123         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  = p1 + n1 + sc * n1;
00124         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir = p2 + tc * n2 - line_pt;
00125         line_dir.normalize ();
00126 
00127         model_coefficients.resize (7);
00128 #ifdef EIGEN3
00129         model_coefficients.head<3> ()    = line_pt.head<3> ();
00130         model_coefficients.segment<3> (3) = line_dir.head<3> ();
00131 #else
00132         model_coefficients.start<3> ()    = line_pt.start<3> ();
00133         model_coefficients.segment<3> (3) = line_dir.start<3> ();
00134 #endif
00135 
00136         // cylinder radius
00137         model_coefficients[6] = pointToLineDistance (p1, line_pt, line_dir);
00138 
00139         if (model_coefficients[6] > this->radiusMax || model_coefficients[6] < this->radiusMin)
00140                 return (false);
00141 
00142         return (true);
00143 }

00146 
00147 
00148 void ObjectModelCylinder::getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, std::vector<double> &distances){
00149 
00150         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 7);
00151 
00152         distances.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00153 
00154         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00155         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00156 
00157         double ptdotdir = line_pt.dot (line_dir);
00158 
00159         double dirdotdir = 1.0 / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00160         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the sphere
00161         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00162         {
00163                 // Aproximate the distance from the point to the cylinder as the difference between
00164                 // dist(point,cylinder_axis) and cylinder radius
00165                 // Todo to be revised
00166                 Eigen::Vector4d pt = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX(),
00167                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ(), 0);
00168 
00169                 Eigen::Vector4d n = Eigen::Vector4d (this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getX(),
00170                                 this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getY(),
00171                                 this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getZ(), 0);
00172 
00173                 double d_euclid = fabs (pointToLineDistance (pt, model_coefficients) - model_coefficients[6]);
00174 
00175                 // Calculate the point's projection on the cylinder axis
00176                 double k = (pt.dot (line_dir) - ptdotdir) * dirdotdir;
00177                 Eigen::Vector4d pt_proj = line_pt + k * line_dir;
00178                 Eigen::Vector4d dir = pt - pt_proj;
00179                 dir.normalize ();
00180 
00181                 // Calculate the angular distance between the point normal and the (dir=pt_proj->pt) vector
00182                 double d_normal = fabs (getAngle3D (n, dir));
00183                 d_normal = fmin (d_normal, M_PI - d_normal);
00184 
00185                 distances[i] = fabs (this->normalDistanceWeight * d_normal + (1 - this->normalDistanceWeight)
00186                                 * d_euclid);
00187         }
00188 }

00190 
00191 void ObjectModelCylinder::selectWithinDistance (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold,
00192                 std::vector<int> &inliers){
00193         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 7);
00194 
00195         int nr_p = 0;
00196         inliers.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00197 
00198         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00199         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00200         double ptdotdir = line_pt.dot (line_dir);
00201         double dirdotdir = 1.0 / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00202         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the sphere
00203         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00204         {
00205                 // Aproximate the distance from the point to the cylinder as the difference between
00206                 // dist(point,cylinder_axis) and cylinder radius
00207                 Eigen::Vector4d pt = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX(),
00208                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY(),
00209                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ(), 0);
00210 
00211                 Eigen::Vector4d n = Eigen::Vector4d (this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getX(),
00212                                 this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getY(),
00213                                 this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getZ(), 0);
00214 
00215                 double d_euclid = fabs (pointToLineDistance (pt, model_coefficients) - model_coefficients[6]);
00216 
00217                 // Calculate the point's projection on the cylinder axis
00218                 double k = (pt.dot (line_dir) - ptdotdir) * dirdotdir;
00219                 Eigen::Vector4d pt_proj = line_pt + k * line_dir;
00220                 Eigen::Vector4d dir = pt - pt_proj;
00221                 dir.normalize ();
00222 
00223                 // Calculate the angular distance between the point normal and the (dir=pt_proj->pt) vector
00224                 double d_normal = fabs (getAngle3D (n, dir));
00225                 d_normal = fmin (d_normal, M_PI - d_normal);
00226 
00227                 if (fabs (this->normalDistanceWeight * d_normal + (1 - this->normalDistanceWeight) * d_euclid) < threshold)
00228                 {
00229                         // Returns the indices of the points whose distances are smaller than the threshold
00230                         inliers[nr_p] = i;
00231                         nr_p++;
00232                 }
00233         }
00234         inliers.resize (nr_p);
00235 }

00238 void ObjectModelCylinder::getInlierDistance (std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00239                 std::vector<double> &distances){
00240 
00241         distances.resize (inliers.size());
00242 
00243         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00244         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00245 
00246         double ptdotdir = line_pt.dot (line_dir);
00247 
00248         double dirdotdir = 1.0 / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00249         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the sphere
00250         for (size_t i = 0; i < inliers.size(); ++i)
00251         {
00252                 // Aproximate the distance from the point to the cylinder as the difference between
00253                 // dist(point,cylinder_axis) and cylinder radius
00254                 // @note need to revise this.
00255                 Eigen::Vector4d pt = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getX(),
00256                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getZ(), 0);
00257 
00258                 Eigen::Vector4d n = Eigen::Vector4d (this->normals->getNormals()->data()[inliers[i]].getX(),
00259                                 this->normals->getNormals()->data()[inliers[i]].getY(),
00260                                 this->normals->getNormals()->data()[inliers[i]].getZ(), 0);
00261 
00262                 double d_euclid = fabs (pointToLineDistance (pt, model_coefficients) - model_coefficients[6]);
00263 
00264                 // Calculate the point's projection on the cylinder axis
00265                 double k = (pt.dot (line_dir) - ptdotdir) * dirdotdir;
00266                 Eigen::Vector4d pt_proj = line_pt + k * line_dir;
00267                 Eigen::Vector4d dir = pt - pt_proj;
00268                 dir.normalize ();
00269 
00270                 // Calculate the angular distance between the point normal and the (dir=pt_proj->pt) vector
00271                 double d_normal = fabs (getAngle3D (n, dir));
00272                 d_normal = fmin (d_normal, M_PI - d_normal);
00273 
00274                 distances[i] = fabs (this->normalDistanceWeight * d_normal + (1 - this->normalDistanceWeight)
00275                                 * d_euclid);
00276         }
00277 }

00280 
00281 bool ObjectModelCylinder::doSamplesVerifyModel (const std::set<int> &indices, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00282                 double threshold){
00283 
00284     assert (model_coefficients.size () == 7);
00285 
00286     Eigen::Vector4d pt;
00287     for (std::set<int>::iterator it = indices.begin (); it != indices.end (); ++it)
00288     {
00289       // Aproximate the distance from the point to the cylinder as the difference between
00290       // dist(point,cylinder_axis) and cylinder radius
00291       // @note need to revise this.
00292       pt = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getY(),
00293                   (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getZ(), 0);
00294       if (fabs (pointToLineDistance (pt, model_coefficients) - model_coefficients[6]) > threshold)
00295         return (false);
00296     }
00297 
00298     return (true);
00299 }
00300 
00301 
00302 double
00303 ObjectModelCylinder::pointToLineDistance (const Eigen::Vector4d &pt, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients)
00304 {
00305         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00306         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00307         // Calculate the distance from the point to the line
00308         // D = ||(P2-P1) x (P1-P0)|| / ||P2-P1|| = norm (cross (p2-p1, p2-p0)) / norm(p2-p1)
00309         Eigen::Vector4d r, p_t;
00310         r = line_pt + line_dir;
00311         p_t = r - pt;
00312 
00313 #ifdef EIGEN3
00314         Eigen::Vector3d c = p_t.head<3> ().cross (line_dir.head<3> ());
00315 #else
00316         Eigen::Vector3d c = p_t.start<3> ().cross (line_dir.start<3> ());
00317 #endif
00318         return (sqrt (c.dot (c) / line_dir.dot (line_dir)));
00319 }
00320 
00321 double
00322 ObjectModelCylinder::pointToLineDistance (const Eigen::Vector4d &pt, const Eigen::Vector4d &line_pt, const Eigen::Vector4d &line_dir)
00323 {
00324         // Calculate the distance from the point to the line
00325         // D = ||(P2-P1) x (P1-P0)|| / ||P2-P1|| = norm (cross (p2-p1, p2-p0)) / norm(p2-p1)
00326         Eigen::Vector4d r, p_t;
00327         r = line_pt + line_dir;
00328         p_t = r - pt;
00329 
00330 #ifdef EIGEN3
00331         Eigen::Vector3d c = p_t.head<3> ().cross (line_dir.head<3> ());
00332 #else
00333         Eigen::Vector3d c = p_t.start<3> ().cross (line_dir.start<3> ());
00334 #endif
00335         return (sqrt (c.dot (c) / line_dir.dot (line_dir)));
00336 }
